about_the_game:
To show our gratitude for the support from our players, we will be offering exclusive PC rewards for all Super Idols, including the full set of Rabbit·Alice and Rabbit·Lilith outfits, thrones, and a variety of rare items! Join our Discord to claim more exclusive PC rewards and get the latest event updates firsthand!

Idol development system, popular social music game! (*╹▽╹*) Welcome everyone to Nico's singing and dancing world~

"Idol Party" is a music game with a lively style using the concept of idols!

Gorgeous costumes, personalized mounts, massive music songs, everything you want is here. Scroll down quickly and let Nico introduce it to you, idolsლ(╹◡╹ლ)

※Dancing & Rhythmic Life

!!Attention: non-combatants please evacuate quickly, this is a gathering of dancing masters~

There are 4 modes in Charming Dance: Rhythm, Classic, Tempo, Tradition. There is also a massive music songs of different genres, bringing a super realistic stage singing experience~

There is another secret, Nico will tell you quietly (づ￣3￣): When the game is over, you can click "Save" to store this game recording in the video gallery, and you can watch it anytime you want~ It can also become a hot video ~


※Karaoke King Enjoy the Sound of Nature

How can it only have dancing? (๑′ᴗ‵๑)~~ Let everyone know about your wonderful singing voice! Select the karaoke mode in the game, choose your favorite song and sing as loudly as you want~

Who said that a concert requires many steps and requirements? In the game, ლ(╹◡╹ლ) you can start your own concert on your own!

There is also a unique sync mode, which can create new bonds with queens/kings of Karaoke!


※ Shining Star Ever-changing Shapes

How to become a fashionista in the Idol Party world ??

Pleasant fashions, campus energetic girls' clothing, trendy men's casual clothing, beautiful ancient style clothing, and limited sets are available for idols to unlock. ╰(*°▽°*)╯What are the idols still hesitating about~

※ brand New Community More Fun to Play

(,,･∀･)ﾉ゛Hi~~~Nico also brought new information! ! ! The main community has been revised~

The main community is not only expanding, but also adding many interactive facilities, such as carousels, swing planes, pedal pianos, etc.~~

Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, si~ What sound is that?

content_descriptors.notes: In the 《Idol Party》 game store, players can purchase a variety of clothing styles, including some daring designs such as swimsuits and revealing sexy dresses. Additionally, some interactive actions between male and female characters may have a certain degree of intimacy and suggestiveness. We also provide players with cartoon-style model props, such as guns and grenades, which do not produce any blood or gore in the game.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHZ+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 或 AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
